name: Small
description: Basic instance, perfect for fast test and dev. Work with embed database or external.

name: Medium
description: Basic instance, perfect for fast test and dev. Work with embed database or external.

name: Large
description: Medium instance for production. Required a external database provider with high-availability. (MySQL/PostgreSQL)

name: X-Large
description: Large instance for production. Required a external database provider with high-availability. (MySQL/PostgreSQL)

name: XX-Large
description: Very large instance for production. Required a external database provider with high-availability. (MySQL/PostgreSQL)
